body:
Please file this bug report at https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/new.

---

## What happened

(please describe what you were doing when this exception occurred)

## Version information

Android Studio `3.5.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 40.1.2` • Dart plugin `191.8423`

Flutter 1.9.1+hotfix.4 • channel beta • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision cc949a8e8b (13 days ago) • 2019-09-27 15:04:59 -0700
Engine • revision b863200c37
Tools • Dart 2.5.0

## Exception

update failed for ActionGroup: Android (Override Target Platform)[Android]


title: update failed for ActionGroup
